title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama project: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other LLMs locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend in chains, agents, RAG, etc.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, dark/light themes, mobile friendly).

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri-based desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models (macOS/Windows/Linux).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with chat history, prompt templates, and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension for sidebar chat, code generation, explanation, and refactoring using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) with examples for docker-compose, CUDA, and ROCm.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain to chat with PDFs locally.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama with tokio support.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, dependency-injection helpers, and minimal API sample.

title: ollama-chat-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama with app mentions, DM support, and streaming replies.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, brainstorm ideas, and answer questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for Ollama news, model sharing, troubleshooting, and ecosystem showcases.
